loans.name: Domitila

texts.es: Domitila tiene 52 años, es separada  vive con sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace 30 años se dedica a criar animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, en donde su hija es su principal apoyo, ya que la ayuda con la alimentación de éstos animales. Por otro lado, uno de la fuente de ingresos que también tiene es el alquiler de habitaciones, puesto que su casa tiene disponible espacios para arrendar. De esta manera es como se gana la vida, por un lado vende animales cada semana de acuerdo al pedido de sus clientes, y por otro el alquiler de habitaciones. Ahora se intensifica en la siembra de alfalfa ya que es el alimento fundamental de los cuyes, para que pueda ofrecerlos a un buen precio. Por lo pronto espera ampliar su granja para que aumentar la producción de animales que tiene. Es su crédito número 14 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero. Asimismo le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Por tal agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de materiales de construcción para mejorar la infraestructura de su granja, así como también desea comprar semillas para la siembra de más alfalfa.
texts.en:
Domitila is 52 years old, is separated and lives with her 3 children in their own home. For 30 years she has been raising small animals like guinea pigs and chickens.  Her daughter supports her in feeding the animals.  Besides the animals, another source of income comes from renting rooms in her house.  Domitila feels that this is how she's making a living:  first she sells animals each week depending on her customers' needs and she rents rooms that are available.  Now she is focusing on planting alfalfa because it is the staple food of guinea pigs so that she can offer them at a good price.  And, she hopes that soon she can expand her farm, so that she can sell more animals.  

This is Domitila's 14th loan and is very happy to know she can have the financial support.  She also likes being part of the community bank because all the members are responsible and very supportive. For this, she gives thanks to all those who will be managing the loan request - it will be very useful in advancing her business.  This loan will be invested in the purchase of building materials to improve the infrastructure of her farm, and also to buy seeds for planting more alfalfa.

loans.use: Comprar materiales para ampliar su granja y semillas de alfalfa. (to purchase materials to expand her farm and alfalfa seeds)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Comprar hilos de diferentes colores. (To purchase threads of different colors)

loans.name: Jose Vicente

texts.es:
José de 25 años, vive en un cantón llamado Playas uno de los lugares turísticos del Ecuador con una diversa dimensión de mariscos. Es conductor de una tricimoto (medio de transporte rápido y eficaz para ir a lugares que un carro no puede)

Desde los 13 años comenzó a trabajar con un triciclo cargando en el mercado las compras de las personas que querían transporte. Debido a que necesitaba mas ingresos cuando se caso decidió comprar una moto y convertirla en una tricimoto. Ahora el transporta personas de los mercados a sus hogares desde las 07h00am hasta las 20h00pm todos los días. Lo mas difícil de su trabajo es transita por la vías en mal estado. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar una carrocería mas grande para que sus clientes tengan mas espacio para su mercadería. En el futuro quiere tener su propia casa ya que vive el y su esposa con los padres.
texts.en:
Jose is 25, and lives in a town called Playas (Beaches).  Playas is one of the Ecuador's tourist sites, known for its diverse available types of seafood. He drives a motor three wheel cycle (this is a quick and efficient transportation system, and it can go places where a car cannot).
Since the age of 13 he began working with his motorcycle by helping people in the market who needed assistance with packages and needed transportation.  Then, because he needed to bring in more revenue, he decided to buy a motorcycle and turn it into a motor-tricycle. Now, he works at the market, transporting people home from the 07h00am until 20h00pm every day. The most difficult part of his job is driving on roads, which are in poor condition.

With this loan, Jose would like to buy a bigger motor-cycle body (cart) so that his customers have more space for merchandise. In the future, he would like to have his own house.  Currently, he and his wife, live with his parents.

loans.use: Carroceria (a cart - body for a motorcycle)

loans.name: Nora Pilar

texts.es:
Nora de 41 años, vende hilos al por mayor y menor a distintas tiendas y talleres de costura. Vive con su esposo quien viaja para promocionar el hilo a tiendas fuera de la ciudad y con sus hijos en el Suburbio de Guayaquil(zona urbana, la mayoría de habitantes son comerciantes informales). 

Ya tiene 6 años comercializando hilos a diferentes tiendas y talleres de confesión y costura debido que su suegro le enseño como hacer hilos ella copio esta carrera para mantener a su familia. Mientras que ella hace el hilo otra persona le ayuda enrollando y cortando el hilo para ser empaquetado, trabajan desde las 08h00am hasta las 16h00pm todos los días. Tiene una producción de mas o menos 2000 hilos. 

Con el préstamo ella quiere comprar materiales, cartón e hilos para mejorar las ventas de su negocio. En el futuro quiere comprar una maquina rebobinadota y agrandar su negocio.
texts.en:
Nora, 41 years old, sells thread wholesale and retail to stores and sewing workshops. She lives with her husband, who travels to promote their thread to stores outside the city, and their children in the Guayaquil Suburb (an urban zone where the majority of inhabitants are informal merchants).

She has already been selling threads for six years to different stores and workshops. Her father-in-law taught her how to make thread, and she took up this career to maintain her family. While she makes the thread, another person helps her, rolling and cutting the thread so it can be packaged. They work from 8am to 4pm every day. They produce approximately 2,000 threads.

With the loan, she wants to buy materials, cardboard, and threads in order to improve her business sales. In the future, she would like to buy a bobbin machine and expand her business.

loans.use: Thread, cardboard

loans.name: Elvira

texts.es: Elvira tiene 45 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace 10 años vende  ropa y bisutería, productos que ofrece a su compañeros de trabajo, ya que es enfermera de profesión y trabaja en un hospital de su ciudad. De esta manera vende sus productos a crédito, además conoce la calidad de clientes que tiene, por eso no se preocupa, sabe que ellos son muy puntuales en el pago. Se siente satisfecha con el trabajo que realiza, ya que le permite tener un ingreso adicional para cubrir las necesidades de su hogar, asimismo desea en el futuro seguir implementando su negocio con nuevos productos. Este es su crédito número 8 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que conocen de su persona que es responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas muy solidarias. Asimismo agradece aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería en prendas de vestir y bisutería.
texts.en: Elvira is 45 years old and lives with her husband and their two children in their own house. She has sold clothing and jewelry for 10 years, offering products to her coworkers. She is a nurse in a hospital in her city. She sells her products on credit, and since she knows the quality of her clients, she isn't worried--she knows that they will be punctual with their payments. She feels satisfied with the work she does, as it allows her to have an additional income to cover her home needs. In the future, she hopes to keep augmenting her business with new products. This is her eight loan from MFP, and she is very happy to know that she has financial support and that they know she is a responsible person with her payments. She is also thankful to be part of their communal bank because all of its members have a lot of solidarity. She is also thankful to the people who will manage the loan she is seeking, since they will help the progress of her business. With this loan, she will invest in merchandise such as clothing and jewelry.

loans.use: Acquire more outfits and jewelry

loans.name: Rosada Group

texts.es:
El grupo Rosada está conformado por tres mujeres trabajadoras una de ellas es Yahaira Vásquez Aguirre quien tiene una comideria desde hace seis años en la cual invertirá el crédito con la compra de arroz, carne, aceite, cebolla, chiltoma, pollo etc.  Ella tiene dos hijos por los cuales trabaja arduamente.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son Jazmina S. la cual tiene un pequeño taller de artesanía donde produce cuadros y ropa desde hace 20años además de comercializar también vende de otros artesanos y Rosa Patricia Torres vende ropa típica desde hace 8 años e invertirá en telas e hilo para bordado.
texts.en:
The Rosada group is formed by three hardworking women. One of them is Yahaira Vásquez Aguirre, who has had a restaurant for six years. She will invest the loan into it by purchasing rice, meat, oil, onions, peppers, chicken, etc. She has two children for whom she works very hard.

The other group members are Jazmina S., who has a small artisan workshop where she has produced embroidered pieces and clothes for 20 years. She then sells them and other handicrafts. Rosa Patricia Torres has sold traditional clothing for eight years. She will invest in fabrics and thread for embroidery.

loans.use: Rice, meat, oil, onions, peppers, chicken, etc.

loans.name: Amsatou Lo Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Ndock Sarré est creé le 18 septembre 2010.il est composé de 6 femmes issus du même village.leur activité est le petit commerce .

Madame Amsatou Lo assise à droite sur la photo est responsable du groupe de solidarité. elle est âgée de 49 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 5 enfants et responsable d'un autre enfant en charge. 

Elle fait la transformation et vente d'huile d'arachide

Avec son nouveau crédit de 50.000 francs cfa elle va augmenter son niveau d'approvisionnement en arachide pour produire plus d'huile

Son objectif est d'accroitre son activité et de participer à la prise en charge de la sante et nourriture de ses enfants.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Ndock Sarré was created September 18, 2010. It is made up of 6 women from the same village. Their activity is small trade.

Mrs Amsatou Lo seated in the right of the photo, is head of the solidarity group. She is 49 years old. She is married, mother of 5 children and cares for one other.

She transforms and sells peanut oil.

With her new loan of 50.000FCFA she is going to increase her level of peanut supplies in order to produce more oil.

Her objective is to grow her business and to contribute to the food and health costs of her children.

loans.use: Transformation et vente d'huile d'arachide

loans.name: Las Flores De San Antonio Group

texts.es:
Dominga es una socia de la alcancía comunal “Las Flores de San Antonio” ella participa más de tres años en este grupo y durante todo este tiempo ha ido mejorando su negocio de a poco tal es así como nos cuenta:
Empecé a trabajar a los 37 años vendiendo quinua y maca con pan queque, mis hijos aún pequeños me acompañaban a cargar las ollas y utensilios para vender desayunos en el mercado de Chosica así estuve dos años; luego tuve que cambiar de negocio a la venta de cerveza en mi casa debido a que tenía que criar a mi hijo pequeño y necesitaba de mis cuidados. Continué vendiendo queque y pudín que yo misma lo preparaba en casa y lo ofrecía a los pobladores de mi zona. Me animé después en hacer comida como caldo de gallida, chaufa, tallarín saltado y gaseosas que era lo que más le gusta a las personas de mi zona; fue este negocio una gran ayuda durante los seis meses que mi esposo no pudo trabajar.
Sustenté con ello los gastos de alimentación para mi familia y ayudar en parte de la educación a mis hijos, dos son profesionales. Con el tiempo adquirí un carrito sanwichero es mi hija quien lo trabaja así nos apoyamos en algunos gastos del hogar. Actualmente sigo vendiendo comida y preparando queque y budines. El préstamo que necesito lo invertiré para hacer el piso de mi casa a fin que se sienten cómodos los comensales; así mismo una mesa y sillas.
texts.en: Dominga is a member of the communal  bank “Las Flores de San Antonio."  She has been a member of this group for 3 years, and during all of this time she has been improving her business gradually.  She tells us, "I began to work when I was 37 years old selling quinoa and maca pancakes.  Later I had to change my business to selling beer from my house, owing to the fact that I had to raise my small child, and he needed my care.  I continued selling cakes and pudding that I prepared in my house and offered to the residents of my area.  Later I was encouraged to make dishes such as chicken soup, chaufa (a Peruvian rice dish),  spaghetti with beef, and to sell soft drinks; these dishes are preferred by the people in my neighborhood.   This business was a great help during the 6 months when my husband was not able to work. With him, I pay for the food expenses for my family and help with part of the educational expenses for my children, two of whom are professionals.  Over time I acquired a sandwich cart; my daughter works with it and helps us with the some of the household expenses.  Now I continue to sell food and prepare cakes and puddings.  I will invest this loan to redo a floor in my house so that my diners can feel comfortable.  In addition, I will buy a table and some chairs.

loans.use: to buy a table and chairs and to refinish the floor of her eatery

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buy shelves to display her products and stock up on soda pop and beer.

loans.name: Cruzes Group

texts.es:
El grupo las Cruzes está conformado por cuatro personas trabajadoras una de ellas es la señora Ana de los Ángeles A. Martínez de 36 años ella tiene una tortillería y los fines de semana hace nacatamales desde hace dos años lo cual inicio con unos pequeños ahorros.  Ella invertirá el crédito en maíz, leña y cerdo para mejorar su negocio y con las ganancias si Dios quiere componer su casa. 
Las otras integrantes del grupo son Yahaira Esmeralda G. de 21 años comerciante de cosméticos actividad que realiza para que sus hijos tengan una mejor calidad de vida. Jovania Isabel A. de 20 años tiene una pequeña venta de gaseosa, helados, chiverías y frescos y Martires Marvin  S. de 31 años desde hace un año se vende pan dulce y pan simple, picos etc.
texts.en:
The Cruzes group consists of four working people.  One of them is Ana de los Ángeles A. Martínez who is 36 years old.  She has a tortilla store and on the weekends she makes nacatamales (type of tamales).  She started her business two years ago with a small amount of savings.  She will invest her loan in corn, wood, and pork to improve her business.  With the profits, God willing, she would like to make up her home.

The other members of the group include Yahaira Esmeralda G., 21 years old, a cosmetics retailer who carries out her work so that her children have a better quality of life.  Jovania Isabel A., 20 years old, has a small business of selling soda, ice cream, yogurt drinks, and juices.  Martires Marvin S., 31 years old, sells sweet bread and plain bread, snacks, etc.

loans.use: To buy corn, wood, pork, rice, potatoes, tomatoes etc.

loans.name: Octavio

texts.es:
La Sr. Octavio F. es cliente recurrente  de nuestra entidad, es casado hace 23 años con la señora Narda Ayala. 
 El señor Octavio F. cuenta con una carpintera y fabrica muebles y otros adornos de madera, hace mas de 20 años, posee una buena clientela formada, el préstamo solicito para comprar madera.
El señor Octavio opera desde el 2002 con Fundación Paraguaya, y solo con nuestra entidad.
Dicho préstamo otorgado,  el titular considera que le dejara un mejor margen de ganancia a su carpintera y a la vez le ayudara para un  mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Mr. Octavio is a repeat customer with our entity. He has been married for 23 years to Mrs. Narda.
Mr. Octavio is a carpenter who makes furniture and other wood decorations. He has been doing this for more than twenty years. He has a good customer base. The loan is to be used to buy wood.
Mr. Octavio has been a member of the Paraguayan Foundation since 2002.  The money for the loan will allow him to have a greater profit margin in his business. This will allow him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: He will buy wood.

loans.name: Mahamadou Rahama

texts.fr: Mahamadou Rahama est un homme célibataire. il y a quelques années il a abandonné les études, afin de pouvoir se prendre en charge, il a ouvert une salle de jeux qu'il exploite pour son propre compte.  les jeunes de son quartier affluent tous les soirs et surtout les weekend dans sa salle de jeux; satisfaire tout le monde il sollicite de WAGES un crédit pour l'achat d'une télé et d'une console Playstation.
texts.en: Mahamadou Rahama is a bachelor. Several years ago he left his studies in order to provide for himself. He opened a games room which he operates himself. The youths in his quarter pour into the games room on evenings and weekends. In order to meet demand, he is requesting a loan from WAGES so he can purchase another television and Playstation console.

loans.use: achat d'une télé et d'une console playstation.

loans.name: Las Gardenias Group

texts.es: Ana María es la presidenta de la alcancía comunal “Las Gardenias” en donde participa junto a otros siete socios. Tiene dos hijos en edad escolar y es casada. Hace  9 años se dedica al comercio, se inicio vendiendo tubérculos en diferentes ferias que se realizan los fines de semana exclusivamente. A pesar de ser desalojada en muchas oportunidades de este tipo de comercio informal, Ana maría a sabido salir adelante pues en forma ambulatoria recorre diversos mercados en donde puede realizar sus ventas. Actualmente cambio de giro y está vendiendo ropas interiores como: medias y trusas en diferentes ferias semanales, con su esfuerzo ha logrado junto con su esposo comprarse un terreno para construir su vivienda. Ana María anhela comprarse un puesto de venta en algún mercado y también construir su casa. .el capital obtenido será invertido en prendas de temporada como truzas, brasieres, medias para damas, caballeros y niños exclusivamente amarillo para el año nuevo próximo. La alcancía Comunal las gardenias posan en esta foto con sus hijos que concurrieron con ellos para agradecer y comprometerse a ser buenos socios y responsables en sus pagos.
texts.en: Ana María is the president of “Las Gardinias” Community Bank. There are six other members of this bank. She has two school age children and is married. For the past six years she has been a dedicated businesswoman. She started by selling root vegetables at different weekend markets. Many roadblocks stopped her from selling in this informal manner. Ana Maria knew how to move forward, buy selling as a roving salesperson in many markets where she has customers that want her products. She actually changed the products she is selling. Now she is selling under clothes, such as socks and underwear, at weekend markets. With her husband, and a lot of effort, she has purchased a piece of land that will be used to build a house.  Ana Maria yearns to buy a booth in one of the markets and also wishes to build a house. The money from the loan will be used to buy seasonal clothing such as girdles, bras, and yellow women's, men’s and children’s socks for the New Year. The “Las Gardinias” Community Bank members pose in this photo with their children. They all are thankful for this opportunity and agree to be good members and pay their payments responsibly.

loans.use: Underwear for men, women and children.

loans.name: Victor Misael

texts.es:
Víctor de 50 años, el es albañil y en horarios rotativos trabaja como conserje en un hotel.  Vive con su familia en el Suburbio de Guayaquil(zona urbana, la mayoría de habitantes son comerciantes informales). 

El es albañil independiente en distintos lugares de Guayaquil, también trabaja como conserje en un hotel tiene turnos rotativos que le ayudan a trabajar como albañil. Trabaja todos los días para darle una mejor vida a su esposa y dos hijos. Su casa es de cemento pero aun no esta bien construida por lo que trabaja muy duro y no ha tenido el dinero suficiente para que este mejo. 

Por eso quiere comprar con el préstamo cemento, pinturas, bloques para arreglar las partes que no están bien construidas. En el futuro quiere ser conocido como albañil profesional y que su casa este bien construida para su familia.
texts.en:
Victor is 50 years old, he is a construction worker and he works in shifts as a concierge in a hotel. He lives with his family in a suburban region of Guayaquil (the urban region is made up of merchants). 

He is an independent construction worker in various locales in Guayaquil. He also works as a concierge in a hotel, taking shifts while he is not working in construction. He works every day to provide the best for his wife and their two children. Their home is made of cement but it’s only partially finished, which is why he works so hard. He hasn't had enough savings to invest in his goal. 

He requests a loan to purchase cement, paint, and construction blocks to finish parts of the house that are not quite done. In the future he wants to be well known as a professional construction worker and to have a well-built house for his family.

loans.use: To purchase cement, paint, and construction blocks.

loans.name: Adzovi

texts.fr: adzovi est une femme  célibataire avec une personne à charge. l'activité qu'elle exerce pour subvenir tous ses besoins est le commerce de détail de cartes de recharges,biscuits et de produits génériques. elle a une expérience de 4 ans dans son commerce et elle s'approvisionne au marché local d'akodessewa. actuellement elle a remarqué que la demande de ses clients augmentent de plus en plus parce que la fin d'année approchent. Pour remédier à cela elle sollicite de WAGES un premier crédit pour acheter 2 cartons de cartes de recharges, 5 cartons de biscuits et divers produits génériques. sa clientèle se compose de toutes personnes.
texts.en: Adzove is a single woman with no children. The activity she carries out to support herself is the retail sale of recharge cards, biscuits and generic products. She has 4 years experience in this field and she gets her supplies from the local market of Akodessewa. Recently she has noticed that the client demand is increasing as the end of the year approaches. To meet this demand, she requested her first loan from WAGES to buy 2 boxes of recharge cards, 5 boxes of biscuits and various generic products. She has a broad clientele.

loans.use: achat de cartes de recharges, biscuits et produits génériques

loans.name: Kofi Kuma

texts.fr: kofi  a ouvert en 2007 son propre restaurant qui lui permet de se prendre en charge. sa clientèle est grande et il est très connu dans sa zone d'activité. à ce jour il constate une baisse des produits nécessaires à l'activité de la restauration raison pour laquelle il s'est adressé à WAGES pour solliciter et obtenir un crédit pour acheter divers produits dont 3 cartons de pâtes alimentaires, 4 cartons de lait concentré "NESTLE" et divers autres produits.
texts.en: Kofi opened his own restaurant in 2007 which enables him to support himself. He has a broad clientele and he is well known in his local area. To date, he has noticed a decrease in products he needs for his restaurant, which is why he has requested a loan from WAGES to buy various products including 3 boxes of pasta, 4 boxes of NESTLE condensed milk and various other products.

loans.use: achat de produits pour la restauration

loans.name: Alice

texts.fr: alice a appris le métier de la coiffure, elle a fini son apprentissage en 2004, en manque de moyens pour ouvrir son propre atelier elle s'est lancé dans la vente de produits cosmétiques. elle s'approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé. La fin d'année étant proche, elle voudrait mettre tous les atouts de son côté et sollicite par conséquent de WAGES un crédit pour l'achat de divers produits cosmétiques pour accroître son stock de marchandises. elle est mariée et mère de 3 enfant, son époux est un topographe.
texts.en:
Alice is a hairdresser. She completed her training in 2004, but lacking the funds to open her own salon, she started selling cosmetics. 

She buys her stocks at the big market of Lomé. With the year coming to an end, she wants to be fully prepared. She is seeking a loan from WAGES to purchase various cosmetic products in order to increase her stocks of merchandise. 

Alice is married with three children. Her husband is a topographer.

loans.use: Buying cosmetics

loans.name: Tarumandy Poty Group

texts.es:
El contacto para el inicio del presente comité fue la señora Rocio Carolina L.  quién  invito y organizo a sus amigas para formar parte del programa Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras.

La Sra. Felicita E. de Olmedo es una de las integrantes y se encuentra muy satisfecha con su actividad ya que diariamente vende gran cantidad de empanadas, y jugos naturales.
Comenta que le ayuda mucho y que se siente realizada como mujer ya que le ayuda mucho a su familia, con el ingreso que obtiene en su actividad de ventas de comestibles.
Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra de carne ya que el precio actual es bastante alto y desea aprovechar el crédito y adquirir en gran cantidad.
texts.en: The main contact at the beginning of this group was Ms. Rocio Carolina L., who invited and organized her friends to come together to join the "Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras" ["Enterprising Women's Program"]. Ms. Felicita E. de Olmedo is one of the members and she is very satisfied with her work. Every day, she sells a large quantity of empanadas [typical stuffed bread pastries] and natural juices. She says that this has helped her a lot, and that she feels fully realized as a woman now that she can help her family significantly with the profits she earns from selling foods. She is requesting this loan to buy meat, as the current price is rather high, so she wants to take advantage of this loan to buy in a larger quantity.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for preparing foods, and especially to buy meat

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: akouvi est une femme de 36 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 2 enfants, elle vit avec sa famille dans le quartier de tokoin à lomé. il y a de cela 7 ans elle s'est lancé dans le commerce de céréales notamment le maïs, le mil et le sorgho qui sont très utilisé dans la cuisine togolaise. elle s'approvisionne à l'intérieur du pays dans la ville d'anié pour avoir une plus grande marge bénéficiaire sur ses ventes. son stock de marchandises a connu une baisse. elle sollicite de WAGES un crédit pour l'achat de 8 sacs de maïs, 3 sacs de mil et 3 sacs de sorgho. sa clientèle se compose de toutes personnes.
texts.en: Akouvi is a 36-year old woman. She is married with two children. She lives with her family in the Tokoin district in Lomé. It has been seven years since she first started selling cereals, particularly corn, millet and sorghum, which is very common in the Togolese cuisine. She stocks up in the interior of the country, in the town of Anié, in order to achieve a better profit margin. Her stock is now running low. She is seeking a loan from WAGES to purchase eight bags of corn, three bags of millet and three bags of sorghum. Her customer base is very diverse.

loans.use: Purchasing cereals

loans.name: Amada Perpetua

texts.es:
Amada de 53 años, tiene una papelería surtida con ventas de ropa, vive con su esposa y tres hijos en el Fortín de Guayaquil( zona periurbana, con caminos de tierra y lomas). 

Hace tres años atrás empezó comprando mercadería para vender a sus conocidos y amigos poco a poco como le fue bien en las ventas decidió tener un local para tener su propio local de ropa pero debido a la demanda de papelería la surtió y compro papeles, cuadernos, plumas etc. En la actualidad trabaja desde las 06h15am hasta las 21h00pm. Vende plumas, papelería, ropa etc. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar blusas, pantalones, papelería para surtir mas su negocio. En el futuro quiere que su negocio este bien surtido y tener una economía estable.
texts.en:
Amada is 53 years old and she has an office supply store from where she also sells clothing. She lives with her husband and their three children El Fortin, in Guayaquil (a mountainous suburban region with unpaved roads). 

Three years ago she started purchasing merchandise to sell to her acquaintances and friends and seeing that sales were good she decided to set up a store. She sells clothing from jer store but given the demand she also started to carry paper, notebooks, pens etc. She works from 6:15am to 9pm. She sells pens, paper, clothing, etc.

She will use this loan to purchase blouses, slacks, and office supplies to stock her business. In the future she wants to have a well-stocked business and to stabilize her finances.

loans.use: To purchase clothing and office supplies.

loans.name: Sénom

texts.fr: sénom est une femme de 31 ans, elle est célibataire; pour subvenir à ses besoins, elle a entamée le commerce de produits cosmétiques. Elle a une ancienneté de 2 ans dans ce commerce et exerce son activité au marché local de Hedzranawoé. la demande de sa clientèle est de plus en plus élevée raison pour laquelle elle sollicite de WAGES un crédit pour l'achat de 5 cartons déodorants, 6 cartons de parfums pour hommes et pour dames.
texts.en: Sénom is a 31-year old woman. She is single. In order to support herself, she sells cosmetic products. She has two years of experience in this business and sells at the local market in Hedzranawoé. The customer demand keeps growing, which is why she is seeking a loan from WAGES to purchase five boxes of deodorants and six boxes of men’s and women’s perfumes.

loans.use: Purchasing cosmetics

loans.name: Afiwa

texts.fr: afiwa est une dame de 45 ans, elle s'est spécialisée dans le commerce de tissus de friperie, elle a une ancienneté de plus de 7 ans dans ce commerce et s'approvisionne au marché local de hedzranawoé. elle fait face ces derniers temps à une demande élevée de sa clientèle. pour y faire face elle sollicite de WAGES un crédit pour acheter 6 balles de tissus de friperie. elle est mariée et mère de 4 enfants.sa clientèle se compose de toutes personnes.
texts.en: Afiwa D. is 45 years old. She specializes in the sale of fabric from used clothing.   She has more than 7 years experience in this trade and gets her supplies at the local market in Hédzranawoé.  Customer demand has increased recently and to cope with this she is requesting a  loan from WAGES to buy 6 bales of used clothing. She is married and the mother of 4 children.  Her clientele consists of all types of people.

loans.use: Purchase of used clothing

loans.name: Akakpo

texts.fr: amétoehoun est une femme de 36 ans très dynamique, elle exerce comme activité génératrice de revenu le commerce de détail de maïs et d'huile. elle a commencé ce commerce en 2009; voulant agrandir son activité, elle sollicite de WAGES un crédit pour l'achat de 5 sacs de maïs et 6 bidons d'huile végétale. sa clientèle se compose de toutes personnes.
texts.en: Amétoehoun A. is a very dynamic 36 year-old woman. Her line of business is the retail sale of corn and oil. She started this business in 2009.   As she now wants to expand her business, she is seeking a loan from WAGES to buy 5 bags of maize and 6 drums of vegetable oil. Her clients include all types of people.

loans.use: Purchase of corn and oil

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es:
Francisco de 52 años, tiene una papelería, vive con su esposa y dos hijos en el Fortín de Guayaquil( zona periurbana, con caminos de tierra y lomas). 

Empezó hace 15 años con su papelería para tener mas ingresos para su familia, desde ese tiempo hasta ahora la papelería ha sido una muy buen fuente de ingresos para soportar la crisis, trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 20h00pm todos los días. Tiene a la venta papeles, cuadernos, plumas, shampoo etc.   

El quiere surtir mas su papelería por eso quiere comprar con el  préstamo cuadernos, plumas, papelería. En el futuro quiere aumentar su negocio y readecuarlo.
texts.en:
Francisco is 52 years old and owns a stationary store. He lives with his wife and two children in Fortín de Guayaquil (a semi-urban zone, with dirt roads and hills).

He started the stationary store business 15 years ago to increase his family income. Since that time, the stationary store has been a very good source of income. To tolerate the economic crisis, he works from 7:00am until 8:00pm every day. For sale in his shop are paper, notebooks, pens, shampoo, etc.

He wants to stock up on more items for his shop. As such, with the loan he wants to buy notebooks, pens, and stationary goods. In the future he wants to grow his business and re-stock it.

loans.use: Notebooks, stationary

loans.name: Estipula Group

texts.es:
El grupo Estipula está conformado por tres personas trabajadoras una de ellas es Eusebia L. quien desde hace 18 años se dedica a la elaboración de tortilla bastimento por excelencia de los nicaragüenses. Ella con el crédito compra maíz, leña, cal para mejorar su negocio y aumentarlo.
Los otros integrantes del grupo son Margarito Antonio R. quien realiza y vende artesanías él se dedica a la elaboración de casitas desde hace 12 años y Ignacia del socorro Urbina Elabora Tortillas desde hace 8 años.
texts.en: The Estipula group is made up of three hard working people. One of them is Eusebia L., who for the past 18 years has made a living making tortillas, a Nicaraguan staple. With the loan she buys corn, firewood, and quicklime to improve her business and to increase her products. The other group members are Margarito Antonio R., who makes and sells artisan goods. For 12 years he has made a living building small houses. Ignacia del Socorro Urbina has made a living making tortillas for the past 8 years.

loans.use: Corn, firewood, quicklime, etc.

loans.name: Naranjaisy Poty Group

texts.es:
Este Comité se formo gracias a la Señora:  Elisea G. de González quien es vecina del Comité.
Todas viven en la compañía Naranjaisy de la Ciudad de Villeta, son gente humilde., pero trabajadora y solidaria.
En esta ocasión hablaremos de María Esther F.  es madre  de dos hijas una de 23 años y otra de 11 años. Ambas colaboran en la atención a los clientes en la Despensa.
Ella se levanta temprano hace las compras en el Centro de Ypane donde compra de Panificados, verduras, pañales, carnes, etc.
Además poseen una motocicleta con la se transportan ya sea al centro de Villeta o de Ypane que les queda más cerca para comprar Bebidas, de esa manera transportan las Bebidas diversas como Gaseosas de distintas marcas como: Coca Cola, Pulp, De la Costay cervezas de marcas como Brahama, Pilsen, y otros. También Vinos en cajas de tetra pack.
Ellas desea que sus hijas estudien una profesión.
texts.en:
This group was formed thanks to Mrs. Elisea G. de G.. She is one of the neighbors in the group. They all live in the community of Naranjaisy, in the cit of Villeta. They are humble people but they are hard working team players.

We will speak about Maria Esther F.. She is the mother of two daughters: one is 23 years old and the other is 11 years old. They both offer customer service in the convenience store.   She starts her day very early to make her purchases in the Ypane shopping center, buying breads, vegetables, diapers, meats, etc. 

She also has a motorcycle that she uses to travel to downtown Villeta or to Ypane, which is closer and best to buy drinks. She is able to transport various types of drinks, including soft  drinks of various brand names (Coca Cola, Pulp, De la Costay), and beers (Brahama, Pilsen, and  others). She also purchases boxed wine, sold in tetra packs. 

She dreams of seeing her daughters study to have a career.

loans.use: To purchase grocery items for resale.

loans.name: Filomena Magdalena

texts.es: La Sra. Filomena Vive en la ciudad de  la paz, en la zona de Tembladerani la casa donde vive es del Papa que todavía vive, la cliente es separada con su esposo hace ya 8 años. Cuenta con dos hijos a su cargo que actualmente están estudiando,  lleva con esta actividad 27 años y cuentan con toda la documentación respectiva como especialista en la preparación de comida rápida. El crédito será destinado para la compra de un kiosco en Villa Fátima donde pondrá una vendedora parea mejorar sus ingresos. Es una cliente bastante dinámica y responsable  además de incrementar sus conocimientos pasando diferentes cursos en cuanto a pastelería, comida rápida se refiere, la cliente esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Filomena lives in the city of La Paz, in the Tembladerani region. She lives with her father in a house that belongs to him. She has been separated from her husband for 8 years now. She has two children in her care and they are in school. She has had her business for 27 years and she has all the official training to work as a fast food cook. The loan will be used to purchase a kiosk in Villa Fatima. She will hire a salesperson to manage the stand and improve her income. She is a dynamic and responsible person. She has attended various cooking courses to expand her knowledge, including: pastry chef and fast food cook. She is very grateful for the support she is granted.

loans.use: To purchase a kiosk for her business.

loans.name: Four Roses Group

texts.es:
El grupo Cuatro Rosa está conformado por tres mujeres trabajadoras una de ellas es doña Sonia A. quien desde hace tiempo se dedica a la realización de sopas los fines de semana ya sea de hueso, de res, mondongo, de pollo, queso…etc. Ella con el crédito comprara carne, las verduras como yuca, quequisque, repollo, ayote, chayote, chilote, cebolla, etc. 
Las otras integrantes del grupo son Estela de Jesús D. se dedica al destace de cerdo desde hace 10 años el vende tanto la carne como realiza frito, nacatamales, chicharrón y moronga, y Manuela del Carmen O. vende manualidades especialmente Hamacas  desde hace 10 años.
texts.en:
The group named "Cuatro Rosa" is made up of three hard working women. One of them is Sonia A.. For some time she has been cooking soups on the weekends, either bone soup, beef soup, stew, chicken soup, cheese soup, etc. With her loan she will purchase meat and various vegetables.  

Another member of the group is Estela Jesus D. and she has been butchering pigs since she was 10 yeas old. She sells meat, but also prepared foods such as fried meat, tamales, pork rinds, and blood sausage.  Manuela del Carmen O. is also a member of the group and she has sold crafts, especially hammocks, since she was 10 years old.

loans.use: To purchase ingredients to prepare foods.

loans.name: Martha De La Luz

texts.es:
La señora Martha de la Luz Pérez A. de 43 años es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora quien desde muy joven ha trabajado arduamente. Ella hace diez años que vende ropa (camisas, pantalones, blusas, ropa interior etc.) de manera ambulante negocio en el que invertirá el crédito para mejorar las ventas especialmente en esta época.
Pérez tiene tres hijos los cuales estudian y en su tiempo libre le ayudan con el negocio. Ella sueña con que sus hijos tengan una profesión y se superen.
texts.en: Sra. Martha de la Luz Pérez A. is 43 years old and a hardworking, strong, and industrious woman who has worked hard since she was very young. For the last 10 years she has sold clothes (shirts, pants, blouses, underwear, etc) as a street vendor. It is in this business that she will invest the loan to improve sales, especially in recent times. Sra. Pérez has 3 children who study and help her work in their free time. She dreams that her children have their own profession and succeed.

loans.use: Clothing goods

loans.name: Genoveva

texts.es: Genoveva tiene 59 años, vive con una de sus hijas en su casa propia. Desde hace 6 años se dedica a la venta de mazamorra típica de su zona. En un inicio lo hacía de manera ambulante, pero hace tres años se estableció en un puesto de venta, donde atiende todas las mañanas hasta altas horas de la tarde vendiendo este postre que tiene mucha demanda. En ocasiones recibe la ayuda de su hijo y sobrinas atendiendo a los clientes; al término de vender todas las raciones de mazamorra, nuevamente compra los ingredientes necesarios para su siguiente preparación. En lo sucesivo desea producir más mazamorra, de esa manera espera aumentar sus ganancias. Es su crédito número 14 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero por que sabe que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Asimismo le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de ingredientes al por mayor, asimismo renovar platos y utensilios que utiliza en su negocio.
texts.en: Genoveva is 59 years old and she lives with one of her daughter in her own home. For the past 6 years she has sold traditional desserts in her region. When she first started she sold her products door to door but three years ago she set up a food stall. She sells her product every day until the very late hours of the evening. Every so often her son helps her to attend to clients. When she has sold out of her desserts she purchases more ingredients to prepare another batch. In the future she wants to produce more of her product to increase her earnings. This is her 14th loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner). She is very happy to have this financial support and she knows that it will be very useful in the advancement of her business. She is also happy to be a member of her community bank because all of the other members are very responsible team players. The loan she requests will be invested in the purchase of ingredients in wholesale, and she will also purchase new plates and utensils used in her business.

loans.use: To purchase ingredients and new plates and utensils.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
El señora María cliente antigua trabaja con nosotros hace 10 ciclos de edad de 38 años vive en la zona del torno barrio 6 de Mayo  hace 25 años que vive en esa zona, oriunda de Santa Cruz el torno, su  Estado civil concubina con el sr. Walter de edad 36 años cuenta con la actividad de servicio de transporte hace  5 años de Santa Cruz al Torno, los señores cuentan con dos hijos a su cargo.                                                                                           Su Actividad  comerciante venta de picadito de verduras  es un alimento que comen a media mañana,  vende en a zona mercado del Torno.
La cliente esta agradecida porque nuevamente confiamos en ella  y agilizamos su prestamos para poder invertir en lo que ella  necesita que es  hacer la reserva de queso como la compra de insumos para elaborar su platillo como ya se acerca todos santos día de los difuntos en Bolivia.
texts.en:
María is a former borrower and has worked with Emprender for 10 loan cycles. She is 38 years old and lives in the El Torno area in the 6 de Mayo neighborhood. She has lived in this area for 25 years and is a native of El Torno, located in the department of Santa Cruz. Her live-in partner Walter, who is 36 years old, has had a transportation service for 5 years in El Torno, Santa Cruz. The couple has two children for whom they care. María works selling ‘picadito de verduras’, a dish with vegetables eaten in mid-morning, in the market area of El Torno.

María is grateful that once again we trust her and have facilitated her loans to be able to invest in the things that she needs – stocks of cheese and buying supplies to make her dish, as All Saints Day and Day of the Dead are getting closer in Bolivia.

loans.use: To purchase supplies and ingredients for making her dishes.

loans.name: Marlene Del Carmen

texts.es: Marlene del Carmen F. de 34 años en 2000 inicio con la crianza de cerdo actividad económica muy popular y en la que invertirá el crédito con la compra de cerdo y alimento para ellos. Ella es madre y padre para sus dos hijos de 17 y 9 años por los cuales trabaja arduamente para que logren un mejor futuro.
texts.en: Marlene del Carmen F. is 34 years old. In 2000, she started raising pigs, which is a popular economic activity and in which she will invest her loan. She will purchase pigs and feed for them. She is mother and father to her 2 children, who are 17 and 9 years old. It is for them that she works hard, so that they will achieve a better future.

loans.use: Pigs and pig feed

loans.name: Damaris

texts.es: Damaris del Socorro G. es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora la cual se dedica al comercio de bolsos de manera ambulante, es decir que comercializa de casa en casa. Esta actividad la empezó hace seis años y su meta es tener una tienda con las instalaciones adecuadas para su negocio.
texts.en: Damaris del Socorro G. is a hardworking, strong, and industrious woman. She dedicates herself to selling handbags house to house. She started selling this way 6 years ago and her goal is to have a store with adequate installations for her business.

loans.use: Handbags

loans.name: Sergio Marcelo

texts.es: El Sr. Sergio Cliente que vive en la ciudad de la paz, en la zona de Sopocachi, la casa donde vive es del abuelo donde cuenta con una ambiente propio que fue heredado por el abuelo, tiene un hijo al cual pasa  pensiones,  don Sergio es de profesión chef con especialidad en comidas a la parrilla, en la actualidad incursiono con un recreo familiar ubicado el la localidad de Huajchilla, rio abajo,  que atiende los sábados y domingos los demás dias se dedica a dictar clases en la universidad en la carrera de hotelería turística. Cuenta con tres empleados de primer nivel los cuales son de su confianza. Lleva con esta profesión 8 años y con el negocio 3 meses por lo cual el crédito será destinado al equipamiento del recreo mas publicidad en radio para mejorar la afluencia de clientes.
texts.en: Sergio is a borrower who lives in the Sopacachi area of the city of La Paz.  He lives in his grandfather’s house where he has own area that he inherited from his grandfather.  He also has a son for whom he pays school fees.  Sergio is a chef specializing in grilled foods.  He recently started a family recreation place located in Huajchilla, Río Abajo where he works Saturdays and Sundays.  The other days he teaches university classes for the hotel management and tourism degree program.  He has three top level employees whom he trusts.  He has been in this profession for 8 years and has had the recreation area for 3 months, which is why the loan will be for purchasing equipment for the recreation place and more radio publicity to increase the influx of customers.

loans.use: To purchase sunshades, children's games and publicity.

loans.name: Urania

texts.es:
Urania Jalina López es una joven trabajadora la cual es propietaria de una pequeña pulpería. Ella inició este negocio desde hace ocho años con la venta de gaseosa, helados, chiverías cuando se independizo de su madre quien tenía este tipo de negocio. Jalina cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo y su hermano quienes le apoyan para ver el negocio en sus tiempos libres.
Ella tiene dos niños por los cuales trabaja arduamente por otra parte está muy agradecida con Adim tanto por los créditos como por las capacitaciones en género y empoderamiento lo que le ayudo a mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Urania Jalina López is a hardworking young woman who owns a small grocery store. She started the business eight years ago when she became independent from her mother, who had the same type of business selling soda, ice cream, and snacks. She has the support of her husband and brother who help her with the business in their free time.

She has two children for whom she worked very hard and is very appreciative of ADIM for the loans as well as the trainings in gender and empowerment that helped her to improve her business.

loans.use: Basic grains, soda, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Irma

texts.es: Irma tiene 54 años, vive con sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace 33 años vende comida, por lo que de un inicio lo hizo de manera ambulante, pero hace 15 años comenzó a tener su propio puesto de ventas, desde entonces atiende diariamente, en la única que prepara sus platillos, mientras que sus hijos la ayudan en la compra de ingredientes en el mercado, además que tiene buena demanda debida a la buena sazón que tiene. Su negocio le ha resultado rentable a lo largo de estos años, pese a que se encuentra ubicada en un sitio menso concurrido pero mantiene a sus clientes por la atención y por la buena preparación de sus comidas. Por tal razón continuara  trabajando, proponiéndose como meta  en mejorar su negocio. Este es su crédito número 13 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, puesto que este aporte le  será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Por otro lado agradece a todas las personas que  serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita, asimismo le gusta ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra al por mayor de algunos ingredientes no perecibles para la preparación de sus alimentos.
texts.en: Irma is 54 years old and lives with her 3 children in her own home. She has been selling food for 33 years.  Initially she sold food in an itinerant manner but 15 years ago she got her own food stall and she has worked there every day since then.  She prepares her dishes while her children help her purchase ingredients in the market.  Her food is in great demand because she is a great cook.  Her business has been profitable all these years in spite of the fact that her stall is located in a less crowded place.  Irma manages to keep her customers because of her attentiveness and the good preparation of her meals.  For this reason she is still working and intends to improve her business.  This is her 13th loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she has financial support because this contribution will be very useful for her business' progress.  She would like to thank everybody who helps to fund the loan which she is requesting.  She likes being part of her community bank because all its members are responsible and very supportive people.  She will use her loan to purchase some non-perishable ingredients wholesale which she will use in preparing her food.

loans.use: To purchase non-perishable ingredients

loans.name: Anibal

texts.es:
El señor Aníbal O. tiene 40 años de edad, está casado desde hace mucho tiempo con la señora Basilia Nuñez y tienen 3 hijos en edad escolar que aun dependen económicamente de ellos. Viven en su propia casa que está situada en Barrio Jardín San Miguel.

El señor Anibal es propietario de un local de venta de bebidas y comidas rápidas tales como empanadas, sándwich, croquetas y otros, además el es entrenador deportivo y constantemente trabaja con la liga encarnacena de futbol. Cuando el no está el negocio es atendido por su esposa quien es la encargada de cocinar las minutas. Gracias a esta actividad ellos pueden mantener su hogar, solventar los gastos diarios, educar a sus hijos y cubrir cualquier imprevisto que se les presente.

Ellos han solicitado este crédito para la compra de más insumos para comidas y también bebidas.
texts.en:
Aníbal O., age 40, has been married to Basilia Nuñez for a long time.  They have three school age children who are still dependent upon them.  They live in their own house in the Jardín San Miguel neighborhood.

Anibal is the proprietor of a place that sells drinks and fast-food like empanadas, sandwiches, croquettes, and other items.  He is also a sports trainer, and he regularly works with the Encarnacena soccer league.  When he is not at his business, his wife takes care of it and cooks the fast-food.  

Thanks to this business, they are able to support their household, pay the daily expenses, educate their children, and cover whatever unforeseen expense presents itself.

They are requesting this loan to buy more supplies for food, and they will also buy drinks.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for food and also to buy drinks

loans.name: Las Estrellitas De San Antonio Group

texts.es: Teresa participa en la alcancía comunal  las estrellitas D. san Antonio hace 1año,  es casada y a sus 54 años D. edad ya logro que sus hijos sean independientes actualmente  con su esposo ayudan  a sus hijos en la formación D. sus nietos. Se dedica a tiempo completo a su negocio D. alquileres D. disfraces para toda ocasión, el crédito será invertido en la confección D. nuevos trajes  con la intención D. ampliar stock D. estreno para las próximas fiestas. Lleva casi 6 años en este negocio y como nos manifiesta ha logrado el bienestar propio y la educación D. sus hijos. Teresa y sus compañeros  socios están contentos D. participar en el programa y se reportan puntuales cada mes.
texts.en:
Teresa has been a member of the communal bank Las Estrellitas D. San Antonio for a year.  She is 54 years old and married.  Her children are grown and she and her husband are helping to raise their grandchildren.    She has a business renting costumes for all occasions that she runs full-time .  

With the loan she will invest in new costumes to increase her stock for the upcoming holidays.  She has been running this business for 6 years now and has been able to proviD. for her own well-being as well as her children's education.  Teresa and her fellow members are happy to be a part of the program and make their payments on time every month.

loans.use: To purchase costumes to rent

loans.name: Nora

texts.es: La señora Nora de edad de 49 años vive en la zona de km14 barrio Simón Bolívar hace8 años  la señora  oriunda  de  Samanchita Gran Chaco Tarija. Su Actividad es la venta de comida hace 1 año y como segunda actividad cuenta con el negocio de una relojería en la zona de la ramada el negocio de la relojería atiende  el yerno porque a ella no le da el tiempo por el negocio venta de comida, ya que es muy conocida por el buen sazón de sus platillos.Estado civil: soltera hace 15 años la señora no cuentan cuenta con ningún hijo a su poder porque todos son mayores de edad y ya tienen una familia.Al mismo tiempos ellos están agradecidos con nuestra entidad por apoyarlos y depositarles la confianza para adquirir su crédito porque lo necesita para la compra de más sillas y compra de un horno para hacer pollo al espiedo y el resto para capital de trabajo.
texts.en: Nora is 49 years old and lives in the Simon Bolivar neighborhood in the Km 14 zone.  She has been making and selling meals for about a year, and her second support is a watch business in the ramada area. Her son-in-law runs the watch business because she doesn’t have time while she’s selling meals; she’s very well known for her well-seasoned dishes. Civil state: single for 15 years. She has no dependants, all of her children are married and have their own families. They are happy with the support she is getting and they are confident she will receive a loan, as she needs it to buy more chairs, an oven to make chicken “espiedo” and the rest to use as business capital.

loans.use: To buy chairs and an oven

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es: El Sr. Orlando  es oriundo de Mairana y vive en Santa Cruz hace mucho tiempo en esta ciudad conoció a su pareja con la que hoy es la madre de sus 4 hijos el se dedica al transporte con microbús anteriormente era solo era  chofer hace 10 años y ahora es el propietario de su propio microbús el dinero que solicito es para la cancelación de su derecho de piso (ser nuevo socio) en aquella asociación de transporte,  el Sr. Vive en la casa de sus Padres . Ubicada en la Zona del Quior, Además el sr. Orlando cuenta con un restaurante donde vende almuerzo de forma diaria y cuenta con una rokola que también le genera ingresos.
texts.en: Mr. Orlando is a native of Mariana and lives in Santa Cruz. A long time ago in this city he met his partner, who is the mother of his 4 children. Mr. Orlando dedicates his professional life to transportation on minibus. He was only a chauffeur 10 years ago, and no he is the owner of his own minibus. The money that he requests is for the the cancellation of his dues (to become a new partner) in the transportation association there. Mr. Orlando lives in his parents' house, which is in the Quior zone. Furthermore, he has a restaurant from which he sells breakfast daily and a jukebox which helps him generate income.

loans.use: Deposit on a transportation line

loans.name: Edith Betty

texts.es:
Edith is a member of the Communal Bank Heart of Jesus, located in the district of Juliaca, in the province of San Román, and the department of Puno. She is 27 years old, in a common law marriage and has two children. She completed her higher education degree.

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for less than a year. Her first loan was for 300 PEN, money she used to increase the capital for her grocery business. 

Edith is now asking for a loan for 800 PEN, with which she will invest by buying products such as rice, sugar, flour, noodles, and other consumables for her grocery business. 

Her dream is to be in good health, expand the business, and have another house. 	

The thing she likes most about the Communal Bank is the money she is able to earn on her savings.
texts.en: Edith is a member of the Communal Bank Heart of Jesus, located in the district of Juliaca, in the province of San Román, and the department of Puno. She is 27 years old, in a common law marriage and has two children. She completed her higher education degree. She has worked with Manuela Ramos for less than a year. Her first loan was for 300 PEN, money she used to increase the capital for her grocery business. Edith is now asking for a loan for 800 PEN, with which she will invest by buying products such as rice, sugar, flour, noodles, and other consumables for her grocery business. Her dream is to be in good health, expand the business, and have another house. The thing she likes most about the Communal Bank is the money she is able to earn on her savings.

loans.use: Consumables such as rice, sugar, flour, noodles, and other items to sell in her grocery store

loans.name: Clara Mary

texts.es:
Clara is a member of the Communal Bank "Star of Gold II," located in the district of Puno, in the province of Puno, and in the department of Puno. She is 29 years old and in a common law marriage and has two children. She has an incompleted higher education degree. 

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for one year. Her first loan was for 500 PEN, which allowed her to increase the merchandise of her grocery business.

She is now asking for a loan of 800 PEN, which will allow her to expand her business of selling groceries. 

Her dream is to have a mini-market. Her favorite part about working with the Communal Bank is the earnings on her savings.
texts.en: Clara is a member of the Communal Bank "Star of Gold II," located in the district of Puno, in the province of Puno, and in the department of Puno. She is 29 years old and in a common law marriage and has two children. She has an incomplete higher education degree. She has been working with Manuela Ramos for one year. Her first loan was for 500 PEN, which allowed her to increase the merchandise of her grocery business. She is now asking for a loan of 800 PEN, which will allow her to expand her business of selling groceries. Her dream is to have a mini-market. Her favorite part about working with the Communal Bank is the earnings on her savings.

loans.use: Products for her grocery business

loans.name: Fabiola Eunice

texts.es: La Sra. Fabiola tiene 3 hijos vive junto con su esposo en casa de su suegra la Sra. es muy emprendedora y apoya a su esposo con los gastos de la casa, su actividad es  la venta de cosméticos y perfumes su mayor deseo es poder estudiar en la universidad ya que ella al Casarse con su pareja abandono la universidad, ahora viven bien cómodamente en la casa de los padres de su esposo y el crédito que desean es para poder comprar un ropero mas grande para su dormitorio ya que el que tiene  quedo muy chico para el tamaño de familia con la que ella ahora cuenta, ahora su deseo es poder ahorrar dinero para comprarse un lotecito y ahí poder construir su casa.
texts.en: Mrs. Fabiola has three children that live with her and her husband in their mother-in-law’s house. She is very enterprising and helps her husband with the household expenses. She sells cosmetics and perfumes. Her greatest dream is to study at the university. When she got married she had to leave her university studies. Now they live comfortably in her husband’s parent’s house. With the loan that she is requesting she will buy a larger wardrobe for her bedroom. The wardrobe is very small for the size of their family. According to what she has told us, she wishes to save money in order to buy a small piece of land and construct a house.

loans.use: She would like to buy bedroom furniture.

loans.name: Fabiana Narcisa

texts.es:
Martha de 28 años, tiene una pequeña tienda en la parte delantera de su casa, vive en el Paraíso de Guayaquil (zona periurbana, con caminos de tierra y las casas están ubicadas en montañas).

Inicio su negocio cuando su esposo la abandono con su hija, por la falta de ingresos ella comenzó a gastar sus ahorros en víveres para venderlo a sus vecinos. En la actualidad trabaja desde las 06h30am hasta el anochecer para tener dinero suficiente y darle una mejor vida a su hija de 9 años. Vende arroz, azúcar, bebidas, lácteos etc. Aunque uno de las dificultades ha sido estar sola y mantener el hogar ella sigue trabajando por su hija.

Con el préstamo quiere comprar arroz, lácteos, vitrinas para su tienda, también poner un poco mas de seguridad en su negocio ya que la delincuencia esta agrandándose. En el futuro quiere tener una tienda mas surtida.
texts.en:
Martha is 28 years old. She has a small store in the front of her house. She lives in the “Paradise of Guayaquil” (a suburb with dirt roads and houses built on the mountains).
She began this business when her husband deserted her and her daughter. Since she had no income, she used her savings to buy groceries to sell to her neighbors. She works from 6:30am until it gets dark in order to have sufficient money and give a better life to her nine-year-old daughter. She sells rice, sugar, drinks, milk products, etc. Although one of her main problems is supporting a home on her own, she continues to work for the sake of her daughter.
With this loan she would like to buy rice, milk products and cabinets for her store. With a larger store she will feel more secure. In the future she would like to have a store with a greater variety of products.

loans.use: Rice, oil

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana tiene 59 años, vive con su hija en su casa propia en compañía de sus 2 hijos ya independientes y con sus familias. Tiene 23 años de experiencia en la venta de verduras, transportando su mercadería hasta las ferias comerciales en las zonas rurales de su ciudad. Es así que trabaja 3 veces por semana viajando a cada pueblo llevando sus verduras, pero cuando termina de vender todo, se dirige a abastecerse de más productos, en la que su hija la ayuda en esta adquisición comprando al por mayor. Sus ganancias lo recaudan cada semana, por lo que considera que éste negocio le es rentable y por tal desea suministrar de más verduras y otros productos. Este es su crédito número 14 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería e incrementar su capital de trabajo, asimismo renovará su carpa y mejorar la infraestructura de su casa.
texts.en:
Juana is 59 years old and lives in her own house in the company of her two children, who are already independent and with their families. She has 23 years of experience selling vegetables, transporting them to the markets in the rural areas outside of her city. This is how she works three days per week, going to each town with her vegetables. When she sells all of them, she goes to stock up on more, which her daughter helps her to do by purchasing wholesale. She earns money each week which is why she considers this business to be profitable and wants to stock up on more vegetables and other products.

This is her 14th loan with MFP and she is very happy to know that she has financial support. She is also pleased to be part of her communal bank because all of the group members are responsible and very supportive people. She is grateful for those individuals who will fund the loan she is requesting because it will be very useful for her business’ progress. With the loan requested, she will invest in the purchase of merchandise and increase her working capital. She will also buy a tent and make improvements to her house’s infrastructure.

loans.use: To stock up on vegetables, to buy a tent for her sales location, as well as to make improvements to her house's infrastructure.

loans.name: Benita Dolores

texts.es: La Sra. Benita es dueña de casa y es Divorciada, vive con un sus dos hijos menores una esta en la universidad y el otro esta en el colegio La Sra. cuenta con un puesto en alquiler en una comercial donde se dedica a la venta de accesorios para celulares , celulares y además de servicio técnico en ese lugar la competencia es fuerte pero ella ya tiene sus clientes además esta abriendo una sucursal en Departamento del Beni ya que su hijo mayor se fue a vivir a ese departamento, Anteriormente la Sra. tenia una venta de abarrotes y hace un año que se dedica a esta nueva actividad y ella indica que le va mejor que antes es una persona muy responsable que además se hizo cargo de una deuda de una amiga a la que ella garantizo, con el dinero del crédito desea comprar cargadores de celular al por mayor.
texts.en:
Sra. Benita owns her home. She is divorced and lives with her two younger children. One is in university, the other in high school.

Sra. Benita rents a stand in a commercial area where she is engaged in the sale of cell phone accessories, cell phones and, in addition, technical service. Competition in that place is strong, but she already has customers and is also opening a branch in the Department of Beni since her eldest son is leaving to live in that department.

Previously, Sra. Benita had a grocery shop, and for a year she has been engaged in this new business. She states that things are going better than before. She is a very responsible person and has also taken charge of a friend’s debt which she has guaranteed. With the money from the loan she wants to buy cell phone chargers at wholesale.

loans.use: Purchase of merchandise (cell phone chargers)

loans.name: Marisol Alexandra

texts.es:
Marisol de 24 años, es vendedora informal de artículos plásticos. Vive con sus dos hijos de 6 y 9 años en el Paraíso de Guayaquil (zona periurbana, con caminos de tierra y las casas están ubicadas en montañas).

Comenzó a vender los artículos plásticos hace ya 8 años atrás, sus primeros artículos fueron plateras, platos. Poco a poco fue surtiendo su mercadería debido al esfuerzo que puso en su trabajo pudo aumentar algunas cosas en su casa. Su forma de trabajo en recorriendo las calles de paraíso desde las 08h00 después que sale a deja a sus dos hijos a la escuela. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar platos, tachos plásticos para tener mas variedad en su mercadería. En el futuro quiere arreglar su casa que ahora es de caña y continuar superándose por sus hijos.
texts.en:
Marisol is 24 years old and sells plastic items informally.  She lives with her two children, ages 6 and  9, in Paraíso de Guayaquil (a peri-urban zone, characterized by dirt roads and houses situated in the mountains).  

She started selling plastic products 8 years ago.  Her first items were plastic utensils and plates.  Little by little, she increased her merchandise inventory and due to the effort she put into her business she was able to acquire some things for her house.  She works as a travelling salesperson on the streets of Paraíso from 8:00 in the morning until her two children get home from school.  

With the loan that she is requesting, she will buy plates and plastic bins in order to have a wider variety of merchandise.  In the future, she wants to fix her house that is now made of cane and to continue excelling for her children.

loans.use: To purchase plastic plates and bins to sell

loans.name: Moncerrate Auxiliadora

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Progreso de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal Ilusiones, esta es una zona urbano marginal muy poblada en esta ciudad, se la conoce como el sector de la cárcel ya que en esta zona queda la cárcel de mujeres de Portoviejo.

La señora Monserrate tiene 35 años de edad, es  viuda y de esta relación tuvo cuatro hijos de 16 – 14 – 10 y 6 años, dos de ellos están en colegio y los otros dos en escuela. Nos cuenta que su vida ha sido muy difícil  pero que ha podido salir adelante a  punta de trabajo y dedicación.
 
Su forma de ganarse la vida es el comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo ya que dedicarse a una sola línea no le permitiría ganar lo suficiente para sus gastos, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta. Trabaja cuatro días a la semana desde las 7h30 hasta las 11 am que llega a hacer el almuerzo para sus hijos y en la tarde desde las 15h00 hasta las 17h00, en las noches se dedica a sus hijos les ayuda en las tareas sobre todo al más pequeño. Compra sus productos en Guayaquil ciudad a la que va una vez al mes.

Este crédito es para ir a Guayaquil a traer más mercadería porque allá es más barata. Este es su cuarto ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por las facilidades que da para los créditos.
 
Su sueño es tener un local donde vender su mercadería.
texts.en:
The Ilusiones Communal Bank meets every two weeks in the El Progreso neighborhood of the city of Portoviejo.  This is a marginal, crowded urban area in the city.  It is known as 'the prison sector' because the Portoviejo women's prison is located in this area.

Monserrate, age 35, is a widow.  She has four children; 16, 14, 10, and 6 years old.  Two of them are in high school, and the other two are in elementary school.  She tells us that her life has been very difficult.  However, she has been able to get ahead through work and dedication.

She sells all kinds of clothes to earn a living.  Working with only one line of clothing would not allow her to earn enough for her expenses.  She sells door to door.  She works four days a week from 7:30 a.m. until 11:00 a.m.   She then goes home to make lunch for her children.  She works in the afternoons from 3:00 p.m. until 5:00 p.m.  In the evenings she helps her children, especially the youngest, with their school work.  She buys her products in city of Guayaquil once a month.

This loan is to go to Guayaquil to get more merchandise, which is cheaper there.  This is her fourth cycle with the communal bank.  She likes the ease of getting the loans.

Her dream is to have a place where she can sell her merchandise.

loans.use: To buy clothes

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
Carmen is a member of the Communal Bank "Santiago The Patron Saint", located in the district Santiago de Pupuja, in the province of Azángaro, and the department of Puno. She is 33 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has three children. She studied until the second year of her secondary education.

Carmen has worked with Manuela Ramos for three years. Her first loan was for the amount of 300 PEN, which she used to increase the capital of her business selling small animals.

She is now asking for a loan of 300 PEN, money that she will use to increase her business selling gelatin snacks, and her business selling small animals. 

Her dream is to have a position in the local market, and to have a house in Juliaca.

Her favorite part about working with the Communal Bank is the meetings, the training, and the workshops.

loans.use: To increase her business selling small animals.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es: Lucia tiene 55 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. DesD. hace 6 años venD. jugos en un puesto D. ventas, ubicado en un mercado pequeño cercano a su casa, en un inicio lo hacía D. manera ambulante. Ahora el negocio que posee le permite trabajar con toda tranquilidad y distribuir D. su tiempo para que pueda realizar diversas tareas que tiene dentro D. su hogar. En ocasiones su hija la ayuda en la atención y en la preparación D. jugos D. acuerdo a la preferencia y gusto del cliente.  Además D. jugos venD. mates D. hierbas calientes, que en su mayoría tiene propiedades medicinales que tiene mucha demanda. Para Lucia su negocio le es rentable, es por ello que desea renovar los artefactos que utiliza para la preparación D. jugos. Este es su crédito número 14 con MFP, esta muy contenta D.  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero por que sabe que le será  muy útil en el progreso D. su negocio. Por otro lado le agrada ser parte D. su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra D. más mercadería en hierbas curativas, frutas y mejorar algunas herramientas que tiene en su  negocio como vasos nuevos y cubiertos.
texts.en: Lucia is 55 years old. She lives with her husband and 2 children in a house they own. For the last 6 years she has been selling juices in a kiosk located in a market close to her house; when she started out, she didn’t have a kiosk and had to walk around selling. Now her business allows her to work with tranquility and distribute her time according to the tasks she has at home. Sometimes her daughter helps tend the kiosk and makes the juice to the client’s liking. She doesn’t only sell juice, she also sells hot herbal infusions that have medicinal qualities and are in high demand. Lucia’s business is profitable and because of this, she would like to replace the equipment she uses to make juice. This is her 14th loan with MFP; she is very happy to have the financial support she needs, as she knows it will help her to grow her business. She is also very happy to be part of the communal bank because all of the members are responsible and supportive. With the loan she’s requesting, she’ll invest in more product like medicinal herbs and fruit, and buy new glasses and utensils.

loans.use: To buy fruits and medicinal herbs, as well as utensils and glasses.

loans.name: Mariela Viviana

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Progreso de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal Ilusiones, esta es una zona urbano marginal muy poblada en esta ciudad, se la conoce como el sector de la cárcel ya que en esta zona queda la cárcel de mujeres de Portoviejo.

La señora Mariela es socia fundadora del Banco Comunal y está muy a gusto porque le han ayudado mucho sobre todo para mejorar sus ingresos a través de su negocio. Ella tiene 31 años de edad y es madre soltera de un niño que ya tiene 10 años y que está en escuela, ella vive en la casa de sus padres.

Es secretaria de una empresa y además es comerciante, vende lencería, perfumes y sabanas, trabaja todos los días, en su trabajo les vende a sus compañeros de trabajo y en las noches recorre y ofrece sus productos a conocidos y amigos del sector, entrega la mercadería a crédito y cobra por semana o por quincena de acuerdo a como prefieran sus clientes. Lo que es perfumes y cremas le envía una tía de Estados Unidos, y la ropa y sabanas la compra en Guayaquil una vez al mes.

Este crédito es para ir a Guayaquil a comprar ropa ya que pronto se viene una temporada buena y espera estar preparada. Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
The Ilusiones Communal Bank meets every two weeks in the El Progreso neighborhood of the city of Portoviejo.  This is a marginal, crowded urban area in the city.  It is known as 'the prison sector' because the Portoviejo women's prison is located in this area.

Mariela is a founding member of the communal bank.  She is very happy with the communal bank because it has helped her.  Above all, it has helped her improve her income through her business.  She is 31 years old, and she is a single mother.  She has a ten year old child who goes to school.  She lives in her parents’ house.

She is a company secretary, and she is also a merchant.  She sells lingerie, perfume, and sheets.  She works every day.  She sells to her colleagues at work, and in the evenings she goes out to sell her products to her friends and acquaintances in the area.  She delivers her merchandise on credit, and she charges by the week or biweekly according to her customers’ preferences.  Her aunt in the United States sends her the perfumes and creams.  She buys the clothes and sheets in Guayaquil once a month.

This loan is to go to Guayaquil to buy clothes.  It will soon be a good season, and she plans to be prepared.

Her dream is to have her own house.

loans.use: To buy clothes

loans.name: Celia

texts.en:
Celia is a member of the Communal Bank "Great Power", located in the district of Ilave, the province of Collao, and the department of Puno. She is 28 years old, married, and has four children. She completed her secondary education.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for 10 years. Her first loan was for 300 PEN, which she invested in the purchase of products for the preparation of quinoa juice (quinoa is a grain-like crop that comes from the region). Celia has two business activities: the sale of bread in the afternoon and the sale of quinoa juice in the morning. She is currently asking for a loan for 2,400 PEN, which she will use to buy the ingredients she needs to maintain operations of her business. Her dream is to buy a bus and start a business transporting people on the route between Desaguadero and Ilave. 

Her favorite part about working with the Communal Bank is the punctuality.

loans.use: To purchase consumables for her business selling food and quinoa

loans.name: Katty Jasmin

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Progreso de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal Ilusiones, esta es una zona urbano marginal muy poblada en esta ciudad se la conoce como el sector de la cárcel ya que en esta zona queda la cárcel de mujeres de Portoviejo.

La señora Katty es socia fundadora y secretaria del Banco Comunal y está muy contenta,  le gusta el comportamiento y seriedad de la asesora que les ha sabido enseñar muchas cosas interesantes que le han servido en su vida diaria.
